entries.message: Some customers are currently experiencing slower than normal instance deployment times. Our engineering team is aware of this issue and is working diligently to resolve this as quickly as possible.

Maintenance completed has planed new super spine in on the network and sr1/2.sea3 and sr1/2.sea5 are now subspines. Notice before maintenance that a 100G link between er1.sea4 and sr2.sea3 was down link was moved to er1.sea4 to ss2.sea3 a jira ticket is open to troubleshoot the down link. Verified all tiedowns are advertised to transit providers and no alarms in icnga and administer.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seattle location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-07-15 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-07-15 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Seattle instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
